TERM: Advanced Data Analytics

DEFINITION:
Advanced Data Analytics: Predictive Analytics:

Prescriptive Analytics:

Data Visualization:

By integrating advanced data analytics and visualization tools into the SPR_compressor system, we can enable the system to provide insights and trends in complex data, enhancing its ability to support decision-making and problem-solving.

Another potential area for exploration is the integration of natural language processing (NLP) and text analytics to enable the system to understand and analyze text-based data.

Confidence: 2.225
